title: Document
description: A document is an object that can be extracted from WordPress pages to identify metadata within its content.

short_desc.description: One sentence description of the document, unique and descriptive.

long_desc.description: A long and detailed description of the content, summarizing everything, in no more than 280 characters.

key_points.description: List of key points summarized from the document.

items.description: key information; a sentence or paragraph.

types.description: Categories describing the type of content.

items.description: The types of content, with specifics for 'other' category.

plugins.description: List of plugin names mentioned in the document.

items.description: Name of the WordPress plugins referenced, in slug format.

versions.description: Software versions explicitly mentioned in the document.
